title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API for easy local LLM inference.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that connects to any local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-hnswlib
summary: Community plugin that adds HNSW-based vector search to Ollama embeddings.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Rust-based TUI for interactive chatting with Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma for fully-local Q&A.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for integrating Python apps with a local Ollama server.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that lets pipelines use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component that embeds a chat interface backed by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, and showcasing Ollama projects.

title: ollama-hackernews
summary: Hacker News discussion on Ollama v0.1.40 release featuring concurrent model loading.

title: ollama-youtube
summary: Tutorial video showing how to build a private ChatGPT clone with Ollama and Next.js.

title: ollama-blog
summary: Official blog post announcing OpenAI-style endpoints for easier drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-mistral-7b-gguf
summary: Hugging Face repo where Ollama publishes converted GGUF versions of Mistral 7B for instant use.
